channel.title: Idk how to do this
channel.description:
Hey,
Whenever i log in this is what i have: [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/ubm1u.png[/img]
But i want it to be like this: [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/n3ntkx.png[/img]
Does anybody have a link with a tutorial for this (This is delta)

item.title: Idk how to do this
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You would want to send the interface for that when a player logs in (probably right after the login sequence is complete). Then you would manipulate the values to actually make it informative. Check out this and this packet.

You would also want to handle the action button click (i think?) by sending the close interface packet - it may be handled client-sided though so just implement it first and see if it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Idk how to do this
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

What dont you know how to do exactly?

Stop giving bullshit answers to everyone…just stay out of the damn server help section…

Anyways that seems to be interface 15244.

Use this to line up the proper sendquest id’s:

Parent: 15244 Id: 15259 "Welcome to Runescape"
Parent: 15244 Id: 15260 "You last logged in @red@%1@bla@ days ago from @red@%2"
Parent: 15244 Id: 15261 "1\n2\n3\n4\n5\n6"
Parent: 15244 Id: 15262 "Jagex Staff will NEVER email you. We use the\nmessage centre on this website instead."
Parent: 15244 Id: 15263 "You have %1 unread messages\nin your message centre."
Parent: 15244 Id: 15264 "Last Password Change:\n%1"
Parent: 15244 Id: 15265 "1\n2\n3\n4\n5"
Parent: 15244 Id: 15266 "CLICK HERE TO PLAY"
Parent: 15244 Id: 15270 “1\n2\n3\n4”

Honestly, if you need more than this… then we may need to Skype or TV or something so I can explain it as easy as possible.

Read full topic
